com.sharethrough.sdk

Class SharethroughListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter
      • com.sharethrough.sdk.SharethroughListAdapter

  • public class SharethroughListAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
    A list adapter which wraps your list adapter and inserts Sharethrough ads.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SharethroughListAdapter(Context context, ListAdapter adapter, Sharethrough sharethrough, int adLayoutResourceId, int titleViewId, int descriptionViewId, int advertiserViewId, int thumbnailViewId, int optoutId, int brandLogoId)
      This constructor returns an instance of a SharethroughListAdapter, which wraps your own list adapter.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SharethroughListAdapter

        public SharethroughListAdapter(Context context,
                       ListAdapter adapter,
                       Sharethrough sharethrough,
                       int adLayoutResourceId,
                       int titleViewId,
                       int descriptionViewId,
                       int advertiserViewId,
                       int thumbnailViewId,
                       int optoutId,
                       int brandLogoId)
        This constructor returns an instance of a SharethroughListAdapter, which wraps your own list adapter.
        Parameters:
        context - The Android context.
        adapter - Your adapter.
        sharethrough - An instance of your configured Sharethrough object.
        adLayoutResourceId - The custom layout for Sharethrough's native ad unit.
        titleViewId - The view which will display the ad's title.
        descriptionViewId - The view which will display the ad's description.
        advertiserViewId - The view which will display the ad's advertiser.
        thumbnailViewId - The view which will display the ad's thumbnail image.
        brandLogoId - The imageView which will display the ad's brand logo.
